pageTitle: Eight Forbidden Instances - Ultimate Scrolls - Age of Wushu - The Revolutionary Martial Arts MMO game from Snail - Play for Free Now!
textBeforeTable: D. Output Items: Normal instance drops (work bench, rare herb, Internal Skill Script, Annotations of Ultimate Scrolls, etc) Treasures of assorted Attributes Level 1-4 Ultimate Scrolls from each School. Vouchers for these Scrolls are dropped in the instances. These vouchers are then exchanged for the Ultimate Scrolls themselves. The quantity of vouchers needed will vary according to different skill levels. Rewards are distributed as follow: To activate the instance, a player with the appropriate School must talk to an NPC inside the instance. Once the instance is activated, progress will then be saved for that player. While players from all eight Schools may enter an instance, only players from a certain School that matches the given instance may activate the instance.
